```{r car-plot}
mtcars %>% 
select(mpg,wt) %>% 
ggplot(aes(wt,mpg))+
geom_point()+
geom_smooth(method="lm",formula=y~x,se=F)+
theme_clean()+
labs(title="Fuel Efficiency and Weight", subtitle = "Heavier cars are less fuel efficient",x="Weight (1000s of lbs)", y="MPG", caption="Henderson and Vellerman (1981)")

```
